title: Leaders Talk About Peace in Ukraine
summary: Donald Trump and Volodymyr Zelensky met in Florida to talk about ending the war in Ukraine. They said they made some progress, especially on security guarantees for Ukraine, which means the US might help protect Ukraine for 15 years. But they still have big problems to solve, like what will happen to the Donbas region. Russia wants to control all of Donbas, but Ukraine wants to keep some control. Both leaders think they are close to a peace deal, but they need to work more on the hard parts. They hope to stop the fighting soon.

keywords.explanation: promises to help protect a country
a region in Ukraine where there is fighting
an agreement to end a war

options: Ukraine wants to give it away

Who might join talks in the future?
What is the goal of the talks?

background_read: The war in Ukraine started when Russia invaded in 2022. Many people have been hurt, and countries are trying to help stop it. Leaders like Trump and Zelensky meet to talk about peace, which means no more fighting. They discuss things like who controls land and how to keep Ukraine safe. It is important because peace helps everyone live better lives.
Article_Structure: WHO: Donald Trump and Volodymyr Zelensky
WHAT: They talked about ending the war in Ukraine and made some progress on security guarantees
WHERE: At Trump's home in Florida
WHY: To try to stop the fighting and make a peace deal

perspectives.description: Leaders are close to a deal and making progress on security.
Big problems like Donbas are still not solved, so peace is not sure.
